name: N26
requirements: A passport and any proof of address (lease, power bills, registration certificate). Depending on your nationality, you might or a plastic German residence permit that is valid for at least 1 year.
depositFeeExplanation: Use Cash26 to deposit cash. The fee is 1.5% of the amount you deposit.

accounts.name: Standard
accounts.description: Free ATM withdrawals, no monthly fee, and multiple languages. It's all you need. My personal recommendation.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.
accounts.creditCardFeeExplanation: Use a virtual card for free, or get a physical card for 10€.

accounts.name: Smart
accounts.description: The N26 Standard account, but with joint accounts and phone support.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.

accounts.name: You
accounts.description: The N26 Standard account, but with travel insurance, liability insurance, joint accounts and phone support. Get the Standard account, and buy insurance separately.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.

accounts.name: Metal
accounts.description: The N26 Metal adds higher interest rates for your savings, phone insurance, a fancy metal card. It's not worth the extra cost.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.

name: Bunq
requirements: One of the supported passports. No Anmeldung or residence permit required.
depositFeeExplanation: Use Barzahlen to deposit cash. The fee is 1.5% of the amount you deposit.

accounts.name: Easy Savings
accounts.description: Free, limited bank account. Bunq accepts more passports than other banks.
accounts.creditCardFeeExplanation: Use a virtual card for free, or pay 9.99€ per year for a physical card.

accounts.name: Easy Bank
accounts.description: Simple account with low fees. Bunq accepts more passports than other banks.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 5 withdrawals per month at 0.99€, then 2.99€ per withdrawal.

accounts.name: Easy Bank Pro
accounts.description: Free ATM withdrawals, 1% cashback, low foreign exchange fees, multiple currencies and investing options. Bunq accepts more passports than other banks.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 6 free withdrawals per month in Europe, then 0.99€ per withdrawal.

accounts.name: Easy Bank Pro XL
accounts.description: Free ATM withdrawals, 1% cashback, low foreign exchange fees, multiple currencies, investing options and travel insurance. Bunq accepts more passports than other banks.
accounts.withdrawalFeeExplanation: 6 free withdrawals per month in Europe, then 0.99€ per withdrawal.
